item.description:
The Station is a local film--some of it filmed in Florence and this particular screening at Popcorn Noir is FREE. However, please RSVP here if you plan to come with us as I can reserve up to 4 seats with my membership at Popcorn Noir. ***Currently our 4 spots are reserved with the first people who have responded. You can RSVP here but will have to reserve through another Popcorn Noir member or go and hope that seats will be available. The screening starts at 9pm but seating begins about 8:15, so arrive close to then for best chance of getting seats.*** It's a small venue, but very neat and you can order meals and drinks during the show if you wish. Here is a link to their menus. I don't see the synopsis online but you can check out trailers etc. on their Facebook page. It looks like fun but I would say it's not a family movie as there is some foul language.

Interested in carpooling? Visit our rideshare page at ridebuzz.org/meetup


Western MA Movie Meetup Group on Facebook:

Facebook.com/filmgroup
item.name: Come out to watch FREE: The Station, a local feature-length film
